item.description: Wall Street cheered news that Southwest’s transformation appears to be taking hold.

item.title: ‘I don’t own a house’: I’m 50 with $2 million and I’m scared about losing my job. Can I retire early?
item.description: “My monthly expenses are around $6,000. That includes rent.”

item.title: Microsoft’s stock may be ‘dead money’ even after historic $357 billion market-cap wipeout
item.description: Microsoft’s stock tumbled over the company’s decision to prioritize internal AI development over immediate cloud revenue.
